description:
As a nature user accessing nature.com from an institution with an AOD licence
I want to be able to access content
name: AOD access control

elements.name: Corporate Unmediated AOD Access -User granted Access

steps.name: I am in within the IP range of an institution which has Corporate Unmediated AOD access
I attempt to access a standard article
I am granted access via Corporate Unmediated AOD Access
the number of units is decreased by 1 for Corporated UnMediated AOD acess

elements.name: Corporate Mediated AOD Access -User granted Access

steps.name: I am in within the IP range of an institution which has Corporate Mediated AOD access
I attempt to access a standard article
I should see a password screen
I enter a valid password
I am granted access via Corporate Mediated AOD Access
the number of units is decreased by 1 for Corporated Mediated AOD acess

elements.name: Corporate Mediated AOD Access -User denied Access

steps.name: I am in within the IP range of an institution which has Corporate Mediated AOD access
I attempt to access a standard article
I should see a password screen
I enter a invalid password
I am denied access via Corporate Mediated AOD Access

elements.name: Licensed Unmediated AOD access - User granted Access to a SciBX article

steps.name: I am in within the IP range of an institution which has Licensed Unmediated AOD access units
I attempt to access a SciBX article
I am granted access via Licensed Unmediated AOD access
the number of units is decreased by 1 for Licensed Unmediated AOD access

elements.name: Licensed Mediated AOD access - User granted Access to a SciBX article

steps.name: I am in within the IP range of an institution which has Licensed Mediated AOD access units
I attempt to access a SciBX article
I should see a password screen
I enter a valid password
I am granted access via Licensed Mediated AOD access
the number of units is decreased by 1 for Licensed Mediated AOD access

elements.name: Licensed Mediated AOD access - User denied Access to a SciBX article

steps.name: I am in within the IP range of an institution which has Licensed Mediated AOD access units
I attempt to access a SciBX article
I should see a password screen
I enter a invalid password
I am denied access via Licensed Mediated AOD access

name: Athens Login

elements.name: Login via Athens Nature

steps.name: I navigate to nature APS journal access page
I click on Article 'Login via Athens' link
It navigates to the Athens login page
I enter valid Athens credentials and click on login button
I can get full access for APS journal

name: Shibboleth Login Nature

elements.name: Login via Shibboleth Nature

steps.name: I navigate to nature.com login page
I click on 'Login via institution' link
I select 'United Kingdom' from the country's drop down and click on Go button
I search for 'University of Portsmouth'in Institution search box and click on search button
I click on 'University of Portsmouth'link
I enter credentials on university login page
It redirects to the nature.com homepage

elements.name: Get full text access of a paid article by Login via Shibboleth

steps.name: I navigate to NM journal access page
I click on article 'Login via institution' link
I select 'United Kingdom' from the country's drop down and click on Go button
I search for 'University of Portsmouth'in Institution search box and click on search button
I click on 'University of Portsmouth'link
I enter credentials on university login page
I should get full text access for NM journal for valid site account

name: Cookie Login

elements.name: User valid login flow on nature application

steps.name: user navigate to nature page
user click on login button
user enter valid credentials and click on Login button
user logged in and able to see the logout link

elements.name: User auto login to ecommerce application  using cookies

steps.name: user navigate to nature page
user click on subscription link
user should be able to see the subscription page and also the logout link

elements.name: User auto login to nature events application using cookies

steps.name: user navigate to nature events
user click on my profile link
user able to see the my profile details

elements.name: User auto login to naturejobs application using cookies

steps.name: user navigate to naturejobs
click on myaccount link
user able to see the user details on that page

elements.name: User auto login to news application using cookies

steps.name: user navigate to news application
user click on myaccount link on news page

name: Myaccount

elements.name: User Myaccount valid login flow access

steps.name: user navigate to myaccount page
user enter valid usercredentials and click on Login button
user see the profile page

elements.name: When User edit the address details

steps.name: user navigate to myaccount page
user click on edit button on profile tab
user modify their address details
user click on confirm button
user should be able to see the modified address details

elements.name: When User change the password

steps.name: user navigate to myaccount page
user click on edit password button on profile tab
user modify their password details
user click on password change confirm button
user should be able to see the password change message

elements.name: Change password Email verification and confirmation

steps.name: user navigate to mailinator mail box
user click on email verification link
user navigate to myaccount page
user enter valid new usercredentials and click on Login button
user see the profile page

elements.name: When User change  the password again

steps.name: user navigate to myaccount page
user click on edit password button on profile tab
user modify their password newly details
user click on password change confirm button
user should be able to see the password change message

elements.name: Change password Email verification and confirmation

steps.name: user navigate to mailinator mail box
user click on email verification link
user navigate to myaccount page
user enter valid again new usercredentials and click on Login button
user see the profile page

elements.name: When User edit their additional information

steps.name: user navigate to myaccount page
user click on edit button on additional information
user modify their Work details
user click on confirm button of work details
user should be able to see the modified work details

elements.name: User Myaccount alerts flow

steps.name: user navigate to myaccount page
user has not signed up to receive any NPG Updates and Alerts
user click on alerts tab
user click on modify button
user select ealerts and click on confirm button
user should be able to see the selected ealerts

elements.name: When User unselect e-alerts

steps.name: user navigate to myaccount page
user click on alerts tab
user click on modify button
user unselect ealerts and click on confirm button
user should not be able to see the selected ealerts

elements.name: User Myaccount subscription and purchase

steps.name: user navigate to myaccount page
user click on subscription and purchase tab
user should be able to see the assigned subscription

description: As a brand new user,I should be able to successfully register on nature.com
name: Nature.com registration via alhambra

elements.name: I am new user registering at nature.com via alhambra if js is enabled

steps.name: I have no account on nature.com
I fill up information required on step 1 registration
Defaults should be loaded (Location based on Locale, Organizaion) on step 2
Default ealerts should appear

elements.name: I am new registrants, I should see a page asking to verify my email address at the end of registration process if js is enabled

steps.name: I have no account on nature.com
I fill up required information on step 2 when javascript is enabled
I should see a confirmation page stating to verify my email

elements.name: I am new user registering at nature.com via alhambra if js is disabled

steps.name: I have no account on nature.com
I fill up information required on step 1 registration
Defaults should be loaded (Location based on Locale, Organizaion) on step 2
Default ealerts should appear

elements.name: I am new registrants, I should see a page asking to verify my email address at the end of registration process if js is disabled

steps.name: I have no account on nature.com
I fill up required information on step 2 when javascript is disabled
I should see a confirmation page stating to verify my email

elements.name: I am new user, I should be able to register on nature.com via alhambra

steps.name: I have no account on nature.com
I don't fill up all the mandatory fields on step 1
I should see error messages on step 1

elements.name: I am new user, I should be able to register on nature.com from srep homepage via alhambra

steps.name: I have no account on nature.com and I click 'register' on srep homepage
I fill up information required on step 1 registration
Defaults should be loaded (Location based on Locale, Organizaion) on step 2
Default E-alerts for that journal should appear

elements.name: I am new user, I should be able to register on nature.com from srep homepage via alhambra

steps.name: I have no account on nature.com and I click 'register' on srep homepage
I fill up required information on step 2 when javascript is enabled
I should see a confirmation page stating to verify my email

elements.name: I am new user, I should be able to register on nature.com via alhambra if js is enabled

steps.name: I have no account on nature.com
I fill up information required on step 1 registration
I don't fill up all the mandatory fields on step 2
I should see error messages on step 2

elements.name: I am a logged in user on nature.com I should not be able to register

steps.name: I am logged in nature.com
I try to register from nature.com page
I should see a message that I am already logged in

elements.name: As a user, I should be able to verify my email if I have completed the registration started on nature.com page

steps.name: I have successfully completed the registration process on nature.com
I go to my mailbox
I should see a verification email
when I click on verify link
I should be taken to nature.com page and I should be logged in

elements.name: As a user, I should be able to verify my email (session valid)

steps.name: I have successfully registered on nature.com
I go to my mailbox
I click on the link in the verification email
I should be taken to journal page and I should be logged in

elements.name: As a user, I should be able to verify my email (session expired)

steps.name: I have successfully registered on nature.com
I click on the link in the verification email
I should be asked to enter my credentials at Alhambra
I should be taken to journal page and I should be logged in

elements.name: I am a new user, and I try to register with a email address which is already used in nature.com

steps.name: I am using an email account which is already in use at nature.com
I fill up information required on step 1 registration and I am redirected to step 2 at nature
I should see login page with a message that this account already exists

elements.name: I am a new nature.com user, with an already verified email address

steps.name: I am registering at nature.com and I use an already verified email address
I fill in step 2 registration information
I should be redirected to the page at Nature where I clicked register on
I should be logged in

name: Referral Access functionality

elements.name: I want to access an article by Referral Access when Referral URL is based on HTTP protocol

I should get access to full text article of 'GIM' journal on nature.com

name: Author contribution statements in author pop-up and author information section

elements.name: an article has one or more authors that have contributed equally to work

steps.name: the information is marked up as an author footnote
the name of one of the authors that has contributed equally is clicked
the author information pop-up opens and contains the statement, "<statement>" in bold with all of the "<authors>" listed below the heading
the author information section contains the statement, "<statement>" with all of the "<authors>" who contributed equally displayed below the heading.

cells: These authors contributed equally to this work.
Matthew A Brown & Emma L Duncan

steps.name: the information is marked up as an author footnote

name: 'Powered by Altmetric' text and link on full trending online page

steps.name: user is on the full trending online page

elements.name: Altmetric text and link on full trending online page

steps.name: Powered by Altmetric link is clicked
explanation text appears

message should read: "This list is provided by an outside source, Altmetric, and contains articles from this journal ordered by the change in online attention in the last 7 days. Altmetric's measure of online attention, which primarily includes social media and mainstream news sources, takes into account the quantity of mentions of an article and the quality of each mention."
